remarks: C1 functions are Lipschitz continuous on closed intervals.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Nov-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)
statement:
c1lip2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
c1lip2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
c1lip2.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( C^n ` RR ) ` 1 ) ) $.
c1lip2.rn $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ RR ) $.
c1lip2.dm $e |- ( ph -> ( A [,] B ) C_ dom F ) $.
c1lip2 $p |- ( ph -> E. k e. RR A. x e. ( A [,] B ) A. y e. ( A [,] B ) ( abs ` ( ( F ` y ) - ( F ` x ) ) ) <_ ( k x. ( abs ` ( y - x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k x y $.
$d B k x y $.
$d F k x y $.
$d k ph x y $.
